title: Episode 495 | "There's a Tape For Everything"
description:
On this episode, Joe gets right into it and discusses the alleged fight between Jim Jones and Freddie Gibbs (23:40). Joe also revisits his statements on the Tory Lanez and Megan Thee Stallion saga after the latest developments (46:05), new music from Roddy Ricch (1:30:30), Ice shares his opinion on "Spider-Man: No Way Home" (1:57:10), the guys celebrate NFL legend, Deion Sanders (2:06:00) and, MORE!

Become a Patron of The Joe Budden Podcast for additional bonus episodes and visual content for all things JBP: Become a member here www.patreon.com/JoeBudden

 

Episode 495 Sleeper Picks

Joe | Lisa Fischer - “How Can I Ease The Pain”

Ice | Gucci Mane - “Long Live Dolph”

Parks | Mach-Hommy - “SEPARATION OF THE SHEEP AND THE GOATS”

Ish | Amy Steele - “Eyes On You” (Ft. Mario)
